basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Joshua Huston. I came to Code Fellows after gaining exposure to technical products and teams through my work at Zillow. I currently work as an apprentice software engineer, data analyst, and an officer in the Army National Guard. My goal is to learn front-end development, then go on to learn Python in 401. In the future, I will work for Zillow as a Software Engineer and potentially transition into the Cyber Branch in the Army to help use my technical skills for cyber defense.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Website that displays store cookie sale data in a table.

projects.title: Coders Pursuit
projects.description: Final Project for Code Fellows 201. Takes user information, presents movie trivia questions with dynamic subject backgrounds, then returns a local storage leaderboard.
images: images/Coders Pursuit Questions and Background Image.png

projects.title: Product Picker
projects.description: Product selector for marketing testing. Displays which products receive most clicks using a chart made with node.js
